paper_abstract: We investigate the family of semi-linear sets of N-t and Z(t). We study the growth function of semi-linear sets and we prove that such a function is a piecewise quasi-polynomial on a polyhedral partition of N-t. Moreover, we give a new proof of combinatorial character of a famous theorem by Dahmen and Micchelli on the partition function of a system of Diophantine linear equations. (C) 2011 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Quasi-polynomials, linear Diophantine equations and semi-linear sets
